summary:
Experienced team lead with a demonstrated history of working in the farming industry.  With a strategic view, able to find connections between seemingly disparate phenomena. Challenging the status quo where needed, always looking for improvement in the organization and myself. Leading people through change  by bringing together differences that help us working productively. 
Skilled in Negotiation, Warehouse Operations, Management, Logistics Management, and Microsoft PowerPoint. Strong professional graduated from APICS and a bachelor degree in Logistics & business administration .

profile_positions.description:
•	Lead the Crop team and collaborate with Product Managers, Demand Managers and Finances to allow maintaining a positice projected available balance of inventory over 36 months with cost consideration. 
•	Lead the Crop team through objectives aligned with Flower Seeds Planning & Supply Operations objectives. Hold periodic reviews with all team members; evaluate indivuals for mid&end year reviews.
•	Execute in collaboration with the other Crop Team Leads the monthly Demand/Supply Review and Reconsilliation process within the regions. Coordinate all planning activities on operational, tactical and strategical horizon to deliver a positive rolling 36 months PAB. Document assumptions. Provide reports and maintain KPIs related to Regional requirements on supply delivery and financial performance.
•	Monitor deliverables from direct reportds; ensure continuity and excellence in service.
•	Ensure at all-time the Crop team awareness of status of their portfolio’s and of any risks and issues affecting the delivery of the sales plan.
•	Manage the global allocation process, translated to allocation plans to the regions.
•	Generate presentations for the Flowers Seeds Supply Review and proposals for review with the regional IBP. Support adoption of one set set of numbers and participate in regional IBP reconciliations.
•	Back up the Flower Seeds Planning & Supply Operations Manager in the ROP and regional IBP reconciliation.
